messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Shyrley's bitchin'
messages.msgSnippet: ... heheheh. I keep thinking about it but someone please stop the dollar plummeting against the pound!!! At Xmas it was £1=$1.44. Now its £1=$1.66. At this
messages.messageBody:
Alan & Brenda Leonard wrote:

> 2/4/03 22:29:
>
> > << While
> > dh has a good job now, why not save money for a dishwasher and the
> > money to ship it. Maybe you can let it sit at your mom's house? >>
> >
> > They couldn't hook it up or plug it in.
> >
> > Appliances and electricity and cabinets and plumbing are all different there.
>
> But money saves just as well here as it does there. Even better, perhaps,
> from Shyrley's comments.
>
> Shyrley, any chance you could save up here and take back enough to buy
> yourself a dishwasher in England?
>
> brenda
> who's never lived in quarters without a dishwasher, and doesn't think she'd
> be capable of doing so anymore...
>

heheheh. I keep thinking about it but someone please stop the dollar plummeting against the pound!!!
At Xmas it was £1=$1.44. Now its £1=$1.66. At this rate all our dollars will vanish!!
We need to raise $10,000 for the actual move too :-(

Shyrley

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Shyrley's bitchin'

messages.msgSnippet: ... But money saves just as well here as it does there.  Even better, perhaps, from Shyrley s comments. Shyrley, any chance you could save up here and take
messages.messageBody:
2/4/03 22:29:

> << While
> dh has a good job now, why not save money for a dishwasher and the
> money to ship it. Maybe you can let it sit at your mom's house? >>
>
> They couldn't hook it up or plug it in.
>
> Appliances and electricity and cabinets and plumbing are all different there.

But money saves just as well here as it does there. Even better, perhaps,
from Shyrley's comments.

Shyrley, any chance you could save up here and take back enough to buy
yourself a dishwasher in England?

brenda
who's never lived in quarters without a dishwasher, and doesn't think she'd
be capable of doing so anymore...
